name: Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Eco-friendly Round Rattan Backpack looks natural and supports the health of our planet. Rattan is incredibly sustainable, it's the fastest-growing tropical wood and preserves the rainforest's natural balance while converting carbon dioxide to oxygen. The techniques used to turn raw rattan wood into furniture and accessories have been passed down for generations, relying on handicraft rather than pollution-heavy manufacturing processes. Rattan's strength and resiliency will hold up well to normal wear and tear, reducing waste by lengthening the life of your bag. Each bag features an iron button closure and is lined in batik print fabric.
details: Measures approximately 9.5" in diameter
Comprised of rattan, leather, atta plant, and iron buttons
Ethically Made in Indonesia

name: Think Green Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan
description: Boon believes in living—and wearing—your values, and The Jacksons make that simple with their jute totes. The There is No Planet B Jute Tote in Kelly Green and Tan is an excellent reminder to live a zero waste lifestyle while focusing on social good. Made from jute, a sustainable fiber that requires little water and no chemical intervention to grow rapidly while regenerating the soil below, the bag holds up well to wear. Each jute bag is handmade by skilled artisans in Bangladesh, who receive fair wages and access to free schooling for their children and medical care for their families. We love the bright green hue, which is the result of a non-toxic process of dyeing in pots over a wood fire and sun drying. Think green, share green.
details: Measures approximately 17.3" x 16.5" with a 4" gusset and 5.9" handle drop
100% Jute
Ethically Made in Bangladesh

name: Sustainable Cylindrical Woven Rattan Purse
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Sustainable Cylindrical Woven Rattan Purse is handmade by Village Thrive's artisan partners in Bali. Woven with super strong rattan, a fast-growing material that benefits the rainforests it grows in, while also converting carbon dioxide into oxygen, this bag will stand the test of time. It features a unique cylindrical strap, iron button closure, and batik print lining.
details: Measures approximately 6.25" x 4.75", with a 22" strap
Comprised of rattan, leather, atta plant, and iron buttons
Ethically Made in Indonesia

name: Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Black
description: Carry your values with this artisan-crafted Sustainable Fique Market Bag in Black. Magda Made is a natural Boon partner for their commitment to zero waste plus social good. Fique—an eco-friendly fiber made from succulents that are harvested and grown locally in the Santander region of Colombia, then handwoven into bags by Soledad Tello, one of Magda Made's Fair Trade, artisan partners. The upper portion of the bag is naturally colored and features a tightly woven black bottom.
details: Approximate size: 20" height x 18" width with 11" strap drop
Sizing, stitching, and color may vary slightly due to handmade nature
Ethically made in Made in Curití, Colombia
Spot clean as necessary

name: Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Handwoven Sun Visor in Black and Blonde is hand woven from Indonesian pandeanous leaves and combines boater and visor style to give you style and shade in one. Village Thrive partners with highly skilled craftspeople in Bali who use traditional techniques to harvest, dry, and weave these leaves into unique sun hats/visors. Contribute to local craftspeople and bring the tropics to your next outing. Offered in two sizes.
details: Total diameter measures approximately 14" with a 3.5" brim
S/M size is recommended for head circumferences between 20.5-21.5"
M/L size is recommended for head circumferences between 22-23"
Exact measurements may vary due to handmade nature
100% Pandanus Leaf
Carefully apply low heat from an iron to the brim to reshape if necessary
Ethically Made in Indonesia

name: Handwoven Sun Hat in Golden Tan
description: Shop sustainably and support local artisans. Village Thrive embodies the Boon mindset by offering sustainable, natural products handmade by Balinese craftspeople. The Handwoven Sun Hat in Golden Tan is hand woven from Indonesian pandeanous leaves and combines boater and visor style to give you style and shade in one. Village Thrive partners with highly skilled craftspeople in Bali who use traditional techniques to harvest, dry, and weave these leaves into unique sun hats. Contribute to local craftspeople and bring the tropics home. Offered in two sizes.
details: Total diameter measures approximately 14" with a 3.5" brim
S/M size is recommended for head circumferences between 20.5-21.5"
M/L size is recommended for head circumferences between 22-23"
Exact measurements may vary due to handmade nature
100% Pandanus Leaf
Carefully apply low heat from an iron to the brim to reshape if necessary
Ethically Made in Indonesia

name: Del Dia Dopp Kit, Navy
description: The Del Día dopp kit is sized just right, keeping your toothbrush and other grooming essentials protected and organized. Like all of the Del Día products, each Dopp is one of a kind, made with repurposed nylon and webbing by a sewer who has total control over its final look. The spacious main compartment is complemented by two internal side sleeves, and a large loop of webbing doubles as a carry handle and hang loop.
details: Repurposed nylon shell fabric
Large main compartment
Two internal side sleeves
Carry loop
One-of-a-kind design

name: Do Good 5 Panel Hat, Papaya Lagoon
description: A classic five-panel hat sporting Cotopaxi's company creed, the Do Good 5 Panel Hat proclaims our mission to make an impact, and inspires others to do the same. Made from 100% cotton, this comfy lid features a subtle, graphic screen print and an adjustable, nylon strap with clip closure for easy adjustability.
details: Low-profile, five-panel design
100% cotton
Screen-printed DO GOOD graphic
Nylon strap clip closure
Soft, breathable eyelets
One size fits most

name: Organic Cotton Blend Socks that Give Water
description: Treat your feet while giving back. Boon partnered with Conscious Step because of their commitment to giving and use of sustainable materials. The 'Organic Cotton Blend Socks that Give Water’ gift set features three pairs of crew-length socks that donate to Water.org, a nonprofit that provides families with access to safe water and sanitation solutions. The set includes three unique prints, each with water droplet embroidery: grey with storm blue and navy polka dots, storm blue with white stripes, and navy with storm blue and mint paisley. The organic, Fair Trade cotton is super soft and the terry padding gives your feet some extra support.
details: Size small is recommended for women's shoe sizes 5-9, and men's sizes 4-8
Size medium is recommended for women's shoe sizes 9.5-14 and men's sizes 8.5-13
75% Fairtrade Organic Cotton, 23% Recycled Polyester, 2% Elastane
Fairtrade, GOTS, and Vegan Certified
Machine wash cold. Do not Bleach. Tumble dry Low. Do not Iron.
Ethically Made in India

name: Repurposed Denim Dog Collar
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. This Repurposed Denim Dog Collar is part of The Foggy Dog's Upcycled Denim collection. For this collection, they partnered with The New Denim Project, a family-operated Guatemalan textile mill that rescues fabrics from nearby factories that would otherwise go to waste and turns them into something new using a chemical and dye-free process that requires very little water and power. This collection has conserved 320 million liters of water, prevented the release of 3,300 pounds of toxic chemicals, and avoided 32,000 pounds of carbon dioxide output. Both sides of the collar are comfortable, natural fabric, which is great for dogs prone to chafing or allergic reactions. Henry, a 23 pound French Bulldog, looks suave in size medium.
details: X-Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 8-12". Yorkies, Malteses, and Chihuahuas are a few examples of dogs who wear X-Small.
Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 11-16". Cocker Spaniels, Pugs, and Corgis are a few examples of dogs who wear Small.
Medium collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 14-19". Pit Bulls, Border Collies, and French Bulldogs are a few examples of dogs who wear Medium.
Large collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 18-26". Labs, Golden Retrievers, and German Shepherds are a few examples of dogs who wear Large.
Measuring your dog's neck to find the appropriate size is strongly recommended. Use a soft tape to measure circumference, allowing ample room to slip two fingers between the dog's neck and collar.
Hand wash or delicately machine wash in cold water. Air dry.
Ethically Made in the USA.

name: Repurposed Denim Squeaky Pet Toy
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. This Repurposed Denim Squeaky Pet Toy is part of The Foggy Dog's Upcycled Denim collection. For this collection, they partnered with The New Denim Project, a family-operated Guatemalan textile mill that rescues fabrics from nearby factories that would otherwise go to waste and turns them into something new using a chemical and dye-free process that requires very little water and power. This collection has conserved 320 million liters of water, prevented the release of 3,300 pounds of toxic chemicals, and avoided 32,000 pounds of carbon dioxide output. Each toy is stuffed with Sustainafill™, an eco-friendly fiber made from recycled plastic bottles. While a dog toy is almost never indestructible, Foggy Dog is given high praise on durability, and they use heavy-duty squeakers that keep going even when punctured.
details: Measures 4.5" x 7.5"
Machine wash in cold water. Air dry.
Ethically Made in the USA.

name: Weatherproof Marine Rope Dog Leash in Crimson Red
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. The Weatherproof Marine Rope Dog Leash in Crimson Red is made of double-braided nylon, which is used year-round on boats for its weatherproof properties and resistance to mildew and fraying. The strong, marine rope is still comfortable for dog walkers even if Sophie tends to pull. Shown here in a vibrant crimson shade that is complemented by brass hardware industrially clamped to each end, as well as an O-ring for a waste bag dispenser or keys. Offered in both 4 and 6-foot lengths.
details: The petite leash measures approximately 5/16" in diameter and weights 5-6 oz.
The petite size is suggested for dogs weighing between 8-30 pounds. Not recommended for dogs over 35 pounds.
The standard size leash measures approximately 3/8" in diameter and weighs 8-9 oz.
The standard size leash features heavy-duty hardware that is suggested for dogs weighing between 35-200 pounds.
Guaranteed by The Foggy Dog's Lifetime Warranty.
Hand wash in warm water with mild soap. Air dry.
Ethically Made in the USA.

name: Love Print Swaddle and Scarf - Blue
description: Celebrate love with print swaddles and scarves designed with babies in mind. Boon partners with Lovevolve because of their commitment to social good. The 100% Organic Cotton Muslin Swaddle and Scarf in blue was designed in honor of the many changes that occur on the journey into parenthood. The unique artwork on each swaddle and scarf was created by Lovevolve founder, Sunny Stack Goode, who believes in the power of words to inspire change. Seeing positive words like ‘love’ can train the brain and lead to more compassion, resiliency, and authentic communication. This product is part of the HONOR THE SHIFT™ campaign which encourages new parents to build strong foundations ready for adaptation. Generously scaled: use as a swaddle, scarf, blanket, wrap or nursing cover.
details: Scarf measures 40" x 78" with fringed edges
Swaddle measures 45" x 45"
The inks used for printing are AZO free, GOTS and Oeko-Tex certified, and completely free from harmful chemicals
Scarf is a blend of cotton, linen, and modal
Swaddle is 100% organic cotton muslin
Machine wash delicate in cold water and hang to dry. Light iron on low heat if needed.
Ethically Made in India

name: Bright Coral Shibori Fabric Dyeing Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. Learn the centuries-old art of Shibori dyeing with their Bright Coral Shibori Dyeing Kit. Each kit includes just enough low-impact dye to color three to six square yards of fabric, three shirts, or anything else you can dream up - while reducing runoff. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability - the wooden shapes are cut from woodshop scraps, labels are produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!), and they use clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Enjoy the bright coral hue of your new textiles then continue learning with We Gather’s trusted sources. They encourage creators to learn about indigenous dyeing practices from around the world through World Shibori Network & Slow Fiber Studios. Each kit is assembled by hand in We Gather's Brooklyn studio.
details: Includes: dye powder, salt, soda ash, synthrapol textile detergent, wooden resist shapes, rubberbands, clothespins, biodegradable gloves, stirring sticks, and instructions
You will need: textiles to dye, a 3-5 gallon bucket, a smaller bucket or large bow, long-handled spoon, 2 empty cups for mixing, and water
Handmade in the USA

name: Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. The Sashiko Linen Coaster Design Kit is a great way to learn the Japanese art of Sashiko, a process of stitching and mending that has been practiced since the 17th or 18th centuries. Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the needle holders cut from leather scraps, to the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) and the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. Your end result will be a pair of hand-dyed pure linen coasters with Sashiko-style stitching. Continue your sustainable stitching journey by exploring trusted sources like Upcycle Stitches and Sashiko Story.
details: Includes: two 5" x 5" squares of linen, pure cotton stitching thread, gold tipped needle, stitch template, wax-free transfer paper, and instructions
Handmade in the USA

name: Mini Loom Artful Weaving Kit
description: Get creative while giving back. Boon supports made in America, sustainable products—and We Gather helps you design your own. The Mini Loom Artful Weaving Kit was created for the amateur weaver or craftsperson. The kit includes everything you need for your first foray into weaving: wooden loom, 6 colors of all-natural yarn, needle and instructions . Every detail is well thought out for maximum sustainability, from the labels produced hyper-locally (just one floor away from their Brooklyn studio!) to the clamshell packaging made from recycled paper and cardboard. The custom designed miniature loom is the perfect size for displaying your finished product and can be reused for future projects.
details: Includes: 3" x 3" wooden loom, six colors of all-natural yarn, weaving needle, and instructions
Yarn colors may vary from those pictured, but will always include six complementary options
Handmade in the USA

name: Autumnal Plaid Flannel Bow Tie Dog Collar
description: Boon loves Foggy Dog nearly as much as we love our four-legged friends. The San Francisco-based company is committed to stylish, durable dog accessories with their American-made products, and they share Boon Market's passion for giving back—they donate a half pound of dog food to animal shelters with every purchase. Both sides of the Autumnal Plaid Flannel Bow Tie Dog Dog Collar are cozy cotton flannel, which is great for dogs prone to chafing or allergic reactions. The bow tie is secured by elastic loops and easily removable from your dog's more casual outings. Choose the small bow for a more traditional look, or the large for a bolder fashion statement. The fall-colored shades of mustard, burnt orange, cream, and slate are complemented by gold tone hardware. Hobie, a 29-pound beagle and very good boy, is wearing a Medium collar with Large bow tie.
details: X-Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 8-12". Yorkies, Malteses, and Chihuahuas are a few examples of dogs who wear X-Small.
Small collars are 5/8" wide and fit necks between 11-16". Cocker Spaniels, Pugs, and Corgis are a few examples of dogs who wear Small.
Medium collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 14-19". Pit Bulls, Border Collies, and French Bulldogs are a few examples of dogs who wear Medium.
Large collars are 1" wide and fit necks between 18-26". Labs, Golden Retrievers, and German Shepherds are a few examples of dogs who wear Large.
Small bow ties measure 4" x 2.5" and large bow ties measure 5" x 3.5".
Measuring your dog's neck to find the appropriate size is strongly recommended. Use a soft tape to measure circumference, allowing ample room to slip two fingers between the dog's neck and collar.
Hand wash or delicately machine wash in cold water. Air dry.
Ethically Made in the USA.

name: Teca Face Mask, Set of 3
description: Made using surplus fabric, these super comfortable, non-medical grade masks keep perfectly good materials out of the landfill. When you wear one, you put the health of your community first. Cotopaxi created a light, breathable mask—something we wouldn’t mind wearing all day long.
details: Follows CDC guidelines
Two layers of 100% repurposed fabric
100% tightly woven cotton
Wire nose adjustment and adjustable ear loops
Accordion pleats that adjust to your face shape
Care Instructions: machine wash cold, tumble dry low, warm iron if needed, do not bleach
